content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I am not committed to a specific price yet. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are open to negotiations, Mr. Schmidt. I would like to start with an offer of 800 Euro per month for the apartment. Is this a price you would consider?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your candor, Mr. Schmidt. I'm here to get the best deal for both parties. How about 850 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Let's try 900 Euro per month. This should reflect the value of the apartment given its central location and modern amenities. Would you agree to this price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mr. Schmidt. I respect your desire for a higher price. How about 950 Euro per month? This is a competitive rate for the area and reflects the quality of the apartment. Would you consider this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Schmidt. If you are intent on a higher price, I may not be able to meet your expectations. However, I can offer 1000 Euro per month, which is a premium rate for this neighborhood. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
